Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students communicating over a distance using a string telephone.
The student can show the string telephone device clearly, with one string connecting two cups (or similar objects) held by each student.
The student can include signs of sound traveling through the string, like sound waves or arrows, illustrating communication.
The student can depict the use of materials provided (e.g., cups and string) in their drawing, showing understanding of how the device is built.
The student can illustrate how the device allows communication over a distance, addressing the purpose of the string telephone.
The student can demonstrate through their drawing an understanding of how technology helps people communicate over long distances.
